TC_DECE_00000 - StreamRenew - DLP - Test Suite Staging

Verify STREAM_DATA and STREAM_DATA_HISTORY row counts

Verify STREAM_DATA and STREAM_DATA_HISTORY row counts

con:testStep.name: Verify STREAM_DATA and STREAM_DATA_HISTORY row counts
